abstract: Peter Prevc wins ski jump victory in Trondheim, Norway, bringing him step closer to World Cup champion title; other ski news noted.

headline.main: Slovenian Extends Lead in Ski Jumping

snippet: The Slovenian Peter Prevc moved another leap closer to becoming the ski jumping World Cup champion with a victory in Trondheim, Norway.
lead_paragraph: The Slovenian Peter Prevc moved another leap closer to becoming the ski jumping World Cup champion with a victory in Trondheim, Norway.
